name: e2e-tests
description: For running end to end tests we use testcafe (https://testcafe.io/) along with its official electron plugin (https://github.com/DevExpress/testcafe-browser-provider-electron)

scripts.start:e2e: cross-env E2E_TEST=true NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='waggle*,zbay*,testcafe*' testcafe --color --hostname localhost -S --screenshots-full-page -p '${DATE}_${TIME}_${TEST_ID}.png' "electron:../ZbayLite" "./**/*.e2e.ts"
scripts.start:e2eWin: cross-env E2E_TEST=true NODE_ENV=development DEBUG='waggle*,zbay*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe --color --hostname localhost -S --screenshots-full-page "electron:." "./**/*.e2e.ts"
